meanings.definition: In a way that does not attract attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: She moved inconspicuously through the crowded room.
meanings.sent2: The small bird perched inconspicuously on the branch.
meanings.sent3: The ninja inconspicuously slipped past the guards, unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: The chameleon inconspicuously blended into its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The spy inconspicuously gathered information without being detected.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not easily seen or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The treasure was hidden inconspicuously in the old chest.
meanings.sent2: The shy child stood inconspicuously at the back of the line.
meanings.sent3: The magician inconspicuously pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled inconspicuously in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The secret door was inconspicuously disguised as a bookshelf.
